article.aria-label: *CANCELLED* District Advanced Placement Saturday Academy at Dickinson High School

h3.a: *CANCELLED* District Advanced Placement Saturday Academy at Dickinson High School

div.div: Location: Board of Education Central Office, 346 Claremont Avenue, Jersey City, NJ 07305
Location: Meeting will be held online

Developing a vision of doing what is best for all students and making them academically competitive in a global society. The real promise is to give every student E.A.R.S., Enrichment, Acceleration, Resources, and Support.
